features: LOCK IN MOISTURE: The e.l.f. Daily Hydration Moisturizer is lightweight and deeply nourishing for smoother, suppler skin.
ANTIOXIDANT-INFUSED: Infused with Aloe to help soothe the skin, Jojoba Oil & Shea Butter help hydrate the skin, Vitamin E to soften skin and Grapeseed Oil to even out skin tone.
LIGHTWEIGHT, CREAMY FORMULA: Absorbs easily and nourishes the skin without weighing it down, revealing a naturally radiant complexion.
FOR EVERYONE: Perfect for all skin types.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat the price for an affordable lightweight moisturizer that works for under $10!
reviews.reviewText: It’s my first time trying this so I wasn’t too sure what to expect, but I do love the tube pump applicator that makes applying the cream easy and able to be stored upright on your counter. The cream itself has a neutral scent and nice texture of not too thick or too runny. A small amount seems to spread a long way. It goes on smooth and is quickly absorbed (I have dry dull skin), it can be layered underneath or over other products without clogging pores or leaving your skin greasy. I’ve been using it for about two weeks in the morning and evening, and have noticed my skin feels a little softer & smoother. My skin is still “dull” but figure long term use may improve those results. Overall, you can’t beat the $8 price tag for a gentle facial moisturizer that will hydrate, firm and moisturize dry skin without weighing it down. The only thing that surprised me was the lack of any SPF protection from the sun. Highly recommend 5-Stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizer you will find
reviews.reviewText: This literally makes my skin GLOW. It does everything promised, and more. It smoothed away any flakiness from dry skin. I apply it at night once a week but I’m sure if I did it daily my skin would be even better. You don’t even need a lot for it to be effective; I use a pea sized amount for my whole face. It smells great as well. A complete steal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the e.l.f. SKIN Daily Hydration moisturizer, and I must say, it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. This product claims to provide deep hydration while nourishing and soothing the skin, and I can confidently say that it lives up to those claims.First and foremost, the texture of the moisturizer is fantastic. It's lightweight and absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving behind no greasy or heavy residue. This makes it perfect for both daytime and nighttime use. I appreciate how it effortlessly glides onto my skin, instantly quenching any dryness or tightness.The hydration this moisturizer provides is truly impressive. Within minutes of application, my skin feels noticeably more moisturized and supple. The formula is enriched with ingredients like hyaluronic acid, a powerful humectant that helps retain moisture, and aloe vera, known for its soothing properties. I have noticed a significant improvement in the overall plumpness and smoothness of my skin since incorporating this moisturizer into my routine.One of the standout features of the e.l.f. SKIN Daily Hydration is its compatibility with various skin types. I have combination skin, and this moisturizer strikes the perfect balance. It hydrates my drier areas without causing excess oiliness in my T-zone. I appreciate that it doesn't clog my pores or cause any breakouts, which is a common concern for me when trying new skincare products.Additionally, I applaud e.l.f. for their commitment to clean and cruelty-free beauty. The e.l.f. SKIN Daily Hydration is free from parabens, sulfates, phthalates, and synthetic fragrances. Knowing that I'm using a product that is both effective and ethically produced adds to my overall satisfaction.In terms of packaging, the e.l.f. SKIN Daily Hydration comes in a sleek, convenient pump bottle. It's hygienic and makes it easy to dispense the right amount of product without any waste. The compact size also makes it travel-friendly, allowing me to maintain my skincare routine on the go.Overall, I highly recommend the e.l.f. SKIN Daily Hydration moisturizer. Its lightweight texture, impressive hydration, and compatibility with different skin types make it a standout product. If you're looking for a reliable and affordable moisturizer that delivers on its promises, give this one a try. Your skin will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price for a great product. I feel like when I started using it it wasn't doing much, but when I paired it up with neutrogena toner pore refining toner, it worked wonders. This dynamic duo made my skin look supple, and I would say it cleared up most of the little bumps on my forehead (iykyk). For anyone going through their skincare journey, I hope you achieve what you dream for your skin and find something that works for you! This definitely works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE- Not greasy & NO breakouts!
reviews.reviewText: FINALLY- A hydrating moisturizer that doesn't give me acne!!! I've had hormonal acne for nearly 2 yrs, and I have used this product for 3 consecutive weeks now! It is not greasy, leaves no film or residue on pillows or linens, is travel friendly with the pump bottle option which makes my nighttime skincare routine very efficient. I would recommend this to anyone! It is so light weight and I even had success using it on dry knuckles. Unfortunately, I couldn't upload a video or photo due to website having issues at time of review. Have a great day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good stuff!
reviews.reviewText: A lot of product and a nice price point! Works well to hydrate my aging skin, but not at all oily. Doesn’t clog my pores or cause other issues. No weird smell. Just good moisturizer that’s easy to use twice a day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for daytime
reviews.reviewText: Ultra moisturizing and perfect for the day time. It feels rich and creamy and not heavy at all. It works so well under my foundation giving with out adding extra oil. I highly recommend if your looking for a deep moisturizer for daytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to love this but I can't get over the weird oily type smell. Ok moisturizer, though.

It's my secons tube of this moisturizer and let me tell you IT'S SOOO GOOD! After I've finished my first tube, it wasn't in stock at my local Walmart, so I tried the white bottle ELF moisturizer instead, but I didn't like it as much. Since I repurchased this one, I decided I'll stick with it, because it's just so good. My skin and I missed it!This moisturizer is thick but smooth. It sinks right into the skin, leaving it soft and bouncy. It's great before makeup. I have dry spots and texture and I feel like it's just the right amount of hydration to prep my skin. It has a nice subtle fresh scent that doesn't linger nor irritate the skin. I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I struggled to find a moisturiser, especially for under make-up when my go-to favourite one was discontinued, tried many but this one has come out on top. So light weight, goes on smoothly, I like the added water in it. Make-up looks fresh and doesn't clog pores. Will certainly be buying again.
I know this is just a moisturiser but it good for my face, it’s my new facial creamI’m so happy
Soy de piel grasa, delicada y con un poco de rosácea y ésta crema me ha venido muy bien!No deja la cara más grasosa, se siente ligera y fresca. La uso de día y de noche
